original_text: He made one cherub on one end and the second cherub on the other; at the two ends he made them of one piece with the cover.
korean_text: 한 그룹은 이쪽 끝에, 한 그룹은 저쪽 끝에 곧 속죄소와 한 덩이로 그 양쪽에 만들었으니

sentences.original_text: He made one cherub on one end
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 한쪽 끝에 한 그룹을 만들고

sentences.original_text: and the second cherub on the other
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 쪽에 두 번째 그룹을 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: at the two ends he made them
of one piece with the cover
